tool_description: Get global city, region, and country data.
name: GeoDB Cities GraphQL
title: GeoDB Cities GraphQL

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geodb-cities-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geodb-cities-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geodb-cities-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geodb-cities-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
